title: I Caught My Husband Flirting
description:
Sarah's husband has admitted to enjoying a flirtatious relationship with an extended family member, and now Sarah is uncomfortable attending their upcoming family trip. - Dr. Laura: "Your husband has a lot to make up for before you can move forward."

Do you trust your spouse? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
